question: Emma works as a data analyst for a major online shopping platform. She has been given a large dataset containing both demographics information about users (age, gender, location, etc.) and their purchasing behavior (frequency of purchases, types of items purchased, average purchase value, etc.). Emma wants to analyze this data to gain insights into the behavior of different user segments, such as the types of products popular among different age groups and differences in purchasing frequency based on location. Which type of data visualization should Emma primarily use to effectively share her insights?
